solutionsList.searchByExerciseOrTrackNam:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the search input field
**UI Location**: Solutions List (search bar)
**When Users See This**: When the search input is empty
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Search by exercise or track name"
solutionsList.showingSolutions:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the count of solutions found, with correct pluralization
**UI Location**: Solutions List (results title bar)
**When Users See This**: After a search or filter has been applied and results are displayed
**Technical Context**: Variables `totalCount` and `solutionLabel` must remain unchanged. `solutionLabel` handles pluralization.
**Current English**: "Showing {{totalCount}} {{solutionLabel}}"
solutionsList.resetFilters:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a button to clear all applied filters
**UI Location**: Solutions List (results title bar)
**When Users See This**: When filters are applied and the user wants to clear them
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Reset filters"
